project1.title: JavaScript Practice
project1.description: This project was done to complete a course in Platzi, specifically the old JavaScript practical course. It is based on 4 modules: one of geometric shapes, another on percentages and discounts, another on the mean, median and mode and finally one on the mean and 10% of wages. This project was made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap and web components.

project2.title: Type Ahead
project2.description: This project was created to put into practice my knowledge in asynchrony, it is based on a search engine that helps us find possible results, based on the typing of keywords. For this I used HTML, CSS, FlexBox, Mobile-first workflow and JavaScript.

project3.title: Flex Panels Image Gallery
project3.description: This project was created in order to put into practice my knowledge in Flex Box. For that I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow and JavaScript.

project4.title: Yard Sale
project4.description: This project was created in order to put into practice multiple knowledge in web development through the creation of an electronic commerce page, clearly it is not finished yet, even so the state in which it is, is optimal to present it here. For that I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow, JavaScript, Webcomponents, React.js and Webpack.

project5.title: Rock Paper And Scissors
project5.description: This project was created to put into practice multiple knowledge in web development, through a small video game called rock paper scissors, I must clarify that in the section of uploading a user icon I have it in development. For this I used HTML, Css, Mobile-First workflow and JavaScript.

project6.title: Playing With CSS Variables And JS
project6.description: This project was created to put into practice multiple knowledge in web development, through selectors which will be graduating the value of the padding, blur and color property. For this I used HTML, Css, Mobile-First workflow and JavaScript.

project7.title: Batabit
project7.description: This is a landing page for a project that brings real time information of the most important exchange houses and currencies in the world. For this I used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, mobile-first workflow and JavaScript.

project8.title: Google Clone
project8.description: This is a project created to clone the Google graphical interface. It was created with HTML, Css, Flex-Box, mobile-first workflow and JavaScript.

project9.title: Js And Css Clock
project9.description: In this project I make a clock that uses the API Data() to make its respective movement shortened to the current time of the computer from where it is opened. For this, I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow and JavaScript.

project10.title: JavaScript Drum Kit
project10.description: This project is based on a set of buttons that when pressed will trigger an audio representing an instrument. For this I used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First Workflow and JavaScript.

project11.title: QR Code Component Solution
project11.description: This project is based on a component to scan a QR code. For this, I used HTML, CSS, Flex-Box and Mobile-First Workflow.

project12.title: Platzi Main Interface
project12.description: This project is based on one of the interfaces that Platzi had. For this, I used HTML, Css, Flex-Box and Mobile-First workflow.

project13.title: Products APP
project13.description: JavaScript application created to modulate a shopping list, with the name of the product, the quantity, the price per unit, the price per set and the time of addition. It also includes an option to remove a specific item or the entire list. For that I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow, JavaScript, Webcomponets, React.js and Webpack.

project14.title: Richard-Evans-Schulter-Blog
project14.description: This is a blog created to expose the work done by Richard Evans Schulter in the Amazon. For that I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow, JavaScript and Webpack.

project15.title: Hold-Shift-to-Check-Multiple-Checkboxes
project15.description: This is a solution to the Hold-Shift-to-Check-Multiple-Checkboxes Project in the JavaScript30 Course with Wes Bos. For that I have used HTML, Css, Flex-Box, Mobile-First workflow and JavaScript.
